posts.post_content:
FS-Mecca slide shell box  $35 shipping included, paypal ok (email for paypal address and confirmation it is available)

I believe this was the box that might have contained T201's, T218's, etc
Condition is fair- the box is a bit flattened, with a bit of paper loss/wear on the side but presents well. The front face (pictured) is unmarked and makes a great companion piece.

PM or email to [url]griffinscards@yahoo.com[/url]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/griffins/cardsforsale/jan10forsale/large/MeccaPack.tif.jpg[/IMG]
